normalized: kouten tower.
also known as the ruins.
located within the deepest reaches of demon city amidahara, a threat level max ultra danger zone.
a jumbled mess of strange freaks, ghouls and monsters --a place that could be called the amidahara of amidahara.
and true to its name, the buildings dotting the landscape all lie in ruins.
the city itself is full of such places, but it's particularly bad here.
there isn't the slightest sign of rebuilding, and scars from the old peninsular war still remain undisturbed.
things being what they are, the place is heavy with the presence of human and non-human dwellers alike.
the paths between the ruined buildings are narrow, hardto traverse, and the line of sight is poor, practically screaming that an ambush can come from anywhere.
i'm half expecting something to lunge from the shadows of the rubble any second just walking around like this.

name: annerose
normalized: bleak as always, i see.
this is why i hate coming out here.

name: rikurou
normalized: you can say that again… woah!
i think i saw something move out of the corner of my eye.
i jump to attention… and it's a dog.

name: rikurou
normalized: i-it's just a dog…"
then again, i've seen what cats can do in this town so i probably shouldn't let my guard down around dogs, either.
plus, the one just now looked like it had a human hand or something in its mouth.

name: rikurou
normalized: (ho--ly crap…)

name: annerose
normalized: rick.

name: rikurou
normalized: wh-what is it!?
an enemy!?
annerose sighs as i quickly proffer kongo yasha.

name: annerose
normalized: not yet.
tone it down a couple notches.
you keep jumping at every little thing and somebody's bound to come after us.

name: rikurou
normalized: th-that's exactly what i'm afraid of…"
even in these creepy ruins, annerose is strolling alongno problem at all.
me on the other hand, i'm freaking out next to her at the tiniest little sound like just now.

name: annerose
normalized: there's nothing to worry about.

name: rikurou
normalized: well i mean, you'll be fine if something happens, but i'm a lot less confident about me…"
annerose turns around to face me and continues to walkbackwards.

name: annerose
normalized: you know, even assuming there was someone around thatcould take you down with your immortal power, you can count them all on one hand, even in amidahara.
she gives me a poke to the forehead as if to say, "got it?

name: rikurou
normalized: ow… that may be so, but half of it's about mentally getting there, you know…?

name: annerose
normalized: 'mentally getting there.
' right.
she turns her back to me with an exaggerated shrug and walks on ahead.
it's like she's saying, "i can't deal with this.

name: rikurou
normalized: (still… it's all easier said than done…)
for someone who used to be an ordinary student, it's notlike i'm going to start acting like a superhero just from getting a little stronger overnight.
there's a phrase that goes, "be always on a battlefield.
it refers to the mindset of a warrior who carries themselves like they're always on the field of battle.
but it's probably a safe bet annerose has never even heard of it.
she stands in the face of battle as naturally as i eat, drink and sleep.
it's not that she takes life and death fights lightly, she just treats them as simple facts of life.
that's why she doesn't jump at every little thing even in a place like this, and she actually doesn't let her guard down around the house, either.
that's her… ever the steel witch, annerose vajra.
me on the other hand… ack.

name: rikurou
normalized: (even if i can't get on annerose's level, i wish i could at least mentally be always on a battlefield… though i suppose that's a lost cause, too…)

name: rikurou
normalized: sigh～～"

name: annerose
normalized: what's got you all mopey?
annerose looks back at me again.

name: rikurou
normalized: huh?
oh, nothing… actually come to think of it, what kind of place is kouten tower?
are we there yet?

name: annerose
normalized: that's right, you've never been out here before, have you?

name: rikurou
normalized: no.

name: annerose
normalized: once we head down this road, there'll be a ridiculously huge building.
that's it.

name: rikurou
normalized: oh, i get it.
it looks red in the evening sun like a bigholy tower or something, so they call it the 'tower of crimson heavens', right?

name: annerose
normalized: ahaha, if only it were so clever.
annerose laughs dryly.

name: rikurou
normalized: that's not it?

name: annerose
normalized: it's painted to look like blood.
because aishe thinks it looks nice.
every inch of it from top to bottom is blood-red.
that's why it's the tower of crimson heavens.
she knits her brow like she despises the very sound of it.

name: rikurou
normalized: th-that's pretty straightforward.

name: annerose
normalized: straightforward it is.
she's always had a sick sense of humor, that aishe.
she's right about that.
painting an entire building blood-red just because you like it is going a little overboard.
nodding to myself, i suddenly realize.

name: rikurou
normalized: um, if she can make kouten tower red just because she feels like it, doesn't that make her a pretty big shot around here?

name: annerose
normalized: ahn?
didn't i mention it?
she's the boss.

name: rikurou
normalized: what…?

name: annerose
normalized: the boss of kouten tower, the queen… heh, queen she says.
that's a laugh.

name: rikurou
normalized: woahwoahwoah, this isn't funny.

name: annerose
normalized: that'd be the case.
annerose nods flatly.

name: annerose
normalized: that said, on the scale of organizations it's no match for the kowloon clan, jimmu group or black dogs.

name: annerose
normalized: it's just aishe having her own little party, plus these guys don't leave their turf much so it doesn't really matter.

normalized: b-but, aren't we about to be asking these kouten tower people for help?

name: annerose
normalized: having fun yet?

normalized: i think you know the answer to that.

name: annerose
normalized: hmhm, oh yeah～.
i can tell ve～ry clearly♪
annerose looks like she's having the time of her life.

name: rikurou
normalized: (so that's why she didn't tell me that aishe was the queen around here… she's always finding new ways to mess with me…)

name: annerose
normalized: and we've got even more good news.
she pops her finger up like some educational tv show girl.
she's into this.

name: rikurou
normalized: let's hear it…"

name: annerose
normalized: the inside of kouten tower is a maze.
it's set up so anyone who enters without an invitation from aishe willmagically never find their way out.

name: rikurou
normalized: we don't happen to have an invitation, do we?
i ask, just in case.

name: annerose
normalized: sure do.

name: rikurou
normalized: let me guess, you ripped it up, burned it up or sliced it up, right?
i get the idea.

name: annerose
normalized: i'd expect nothing less from my servant.
one point for you.

name: rikurou
normalized: you're too kind.
as we go back and forth--
annerose's expression suddenly tenses up.

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose!?

name: annerose
normalized: here we go.

name: rikurou
normalized: huh?
ah…!?
i hadn't noticed it until now, but a mysterious mist had suddenly rolled in out of nowhere.

name: rikurou
normalized: wh-what's going on…!?
m-m-maybe it's the cursed maze…!?
so much for the "be always on the battlefield" mindset, my heart's already about to pound out of my chest.

name: annerose
normalized: no, we haven't gone in yet.
i do smell some nasty magic floating around, though.
annerose narrows her eyes, searching for shadows lurking within the mist.

name: rikurou
normalized: th-then what is it…!?

name: annerose
normalized: enemies.
annerose holds her right hand out to me.

name: rikurou
normalized: h-here!
i hand over kongo yasha, entrusted to me by michiko.

name: annerose
normalized: thanks.
her fingers close around it.
the black threads extending from the guard cover her arm in an instant.
she slightly widens her stance, the blade hanging naturally from her right hand with the tip making an easy curve to the left.
that familiar, relaxed stance helps me regain a bit of my mental composure.

name: rikurou
normalized: you think it's one of the organizations?

name: annerose
normalized: no, take a look…"
annerose points with her chin.
from out of the mysterious mist appear assassins clad in black.
and what's more, they're of the shambling, dead variety.

name: rikurou
normalized: gifts from barde, i'm assuming.

name: annerose
normalized: bullseye!
kongo yasha streaks up like lightning.
the charging zombie assassin is ripped clean in two from crotch to crown.

name: rikurou
normalized: wha…!?
they're fast!
compared to the zombies that attacked us before, their movements are incomparably fluid and agile.

name: annerose
normalized: whether they're new and improved or it's because of this mist, it looks like we've got ourselves a handful again.
annerose smiles fearlessly as she adopts her high stance.
ten zombies appear one after another from within the depthsof the mist.
in addition to the one she just opened up and the black-clad assassins, there are even zombies that look like they used to be outlaws.

name: annerose
normalized: seems he's been making the rounds to pick these ones up.

normalized: i-i've got a really bad feeling about this.

normalized: out of our way!
